events.title: Game Night: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
events.description: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a party game where everyone works together to defuse a bomb. At game night, if a bomb is defused everyone in the audience helping wins a prize! Event is hosted in Portuguese and English.

tournament.title: Game Night: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes

events.rules:
üáßüá∑

Pontos Chave:

  • O evento será realizado no servidor do Discord da Fractal, no Stage da Game Night
  • O evento será realizado em Português e Inglês
  • Se um enigma for resolvido, todos que ajudaram seram premiados em USDC
  • Esse é um evento que funciona no sistema de "boost"

Formato da Game Night de Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes:

"Keep talking and Nobody Explodes" é um party game de enigmas, onde os participantes da Game Night precisam trabalhar juntos pra resolver os enigmas para conseguir desarmar as bombas. Se uma bomba for desarmada, todos na audiência que estiverem ajudando (acertando ou não) ganharão uma premiação em USDC!

Esse é um evento no formato de "boost"

Compre um NFT de boost da Game Night na aba de "Craft" no site da Fractal usando um (1) Golden Game Night NFT. Ter o ticket de boost em sua conta durante o evento desbloqueará prêmios maiores pra cada bomba desarmada!

Após a Game Night você deve enviar seu iticket d eboost para este endereço para receber seus prêmios aumentados: 6wyztYU2ymhenwTGsKMxYaz7YchHYUAA8n2G1bjvFgY2

$0.50 USDC

How to prepare for Game Night:

  • Crie uma conta na Fractal, caso ainda não tenha uma (As premiações serão enviadas apenas para carteiras da Fractal)
  • Linke sua conta do Discord com a sua conta da Fractal na aba "Account Profile"

Como participar da Game Night:

Para participar da Game Night, clique no stage da Game Night ‚Å†no Discord da Fractal na hora definida. Ajustem seus alarmes e estejam lá! Esse é um evento ao vivo, então NÃO SE ATRASE!

üá∫üá∏

Key Points

  • Event will be hosted in the Fractal Discord Server on the Game Night Stage
  • Event will be hosted in Portuguese and English
  • If a puzzle is solved, everyone who helped wins USDC
  • This is a boostable event

Keep Talking Game Night Format:

Keep talking and Nobody explodes is a party puzzle game where game nighters need to work together to solve puzzles to defuse a bomb. If a bomb is defused everyone in the audience who is helping will win USDC!

This is a boostable event.

Purchase an game night boost ticket on the Crafting page of Fractal using one (1) Golden Game Night NFT.  Holding a boost ticket during the event will unlock boosted prizes for each bomb defused!

After game night you must send your boost ticket to this address to receive your boosted prizes: 6wyztYU2ymhenwTGsKMxYaz7YchHYUAA8n2G1bjvFgY2

How to Join Game Night:

To join game night, click on the game night stage ‚Å†in the Fractal Discord server at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

events.title: üåç EU Game Night: Crab Game
events.description: Community game nights are live events in the Fractal discord server. Come and play for a chance to take home part of the $100 prize pool! Free to enter, everyone is welcome!
events.rules:
Join the Fractal Discord server to play in Game Nights!

Game Night Format:

 We will be running multiple lobbies of Crab Game. Each lobby can host up to 40 players which will be allowed in on a FCFS basis. The winner of each game will receive a $5 prize! An additional $2 prize will be awarded to gamers who make it to the final round. Be sure to set your username in-game to match your discord username so we can find you quickly if you win, and be prepared to take a screenshot to prove you made it to the final round.

Throughout the night we'll also be spinning the wheel-of-winning and giving away $5 to participants who have attended game night.

Prizes

Rank Prize
First Place $5
Last Round $2

How to prepare for Game Night:

  • Link your discord account to your Fractal account in your Account Profile page
  • Download Crab Game from Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782210/Crab_Game/
  • Please make sure your Crab Game name is similar to your discord username!

How to Play in Fractal Game Night:

  • To join game night, click on the game night stage in the Fractal Discord server at the right time or tune in to the stream live on this event card. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

events.title: PH Game Night: Farlight 84 Hide and Seek Challenge
events.description: Bring out your inner Solid Snake and join the Fractal Philippine Community Game Night for some games of Hide and Seek in Farlight84! Escape the streamer seekers as long as you can! The last 7 players to be found in each round take home a cash prize! Play on Android, iOS, or Steam.  Event will be hosted in Tagalog.

tournament.title: PH Game Night: Farlight 84 Hide and Seek Challenge

events.rules:
Key Info:

  • Event will be hosted in the Fractal Discord Server on the Game Night Stage
  • Event will be hosted in Tagalog üáµüá≠
  • Hide and Seek game using Farlight 84

Game Night Format:

SleeplessNix will be hosting games of hide and seek in Farlight84! Each lobby can support up to 48 players at a time.  In every game, you'll be assigned to a random squad but its every player for themselves as only the survivors will receive prizes. Use all your hiding skills to escape the streamer seekers and stay alive til the end of the match and take home a cash prize!

Play on Steam, iOS or Android

Event rules:

  • Do Not take slot 1 or you will get kicked out of the lobby. If you’re assigned to slot one please choose a different slot right away.
  • Momoi, Phantom, and Ceanna are banned from hide and seek. Do not choose these characters
  • Do NOT kill each other
  • You may use vehicles to run away from the hunters (if you can find a vehicle)
  • Turn on your in-game comms to ‘ALL” (don’t trash talk other participants)
  • Seekers drop point will be Carnivale. (Drop there at your own risk)
  • Games will start when lobby is full. FCFS

Prize Distribution

(per match)

Rank Prize (USDC)
First Place $5
2nd Place $5
3rd Place $3
4-7 $2.50

How to prepare for Game Night: 

  • Download Farlight84 on Steam, ios, or Android
  • Create a Fractal account (Prizes will only be sent to Fractal wallets)
  • Link your Discord account to your Fractal account in your Account Profile
  • Be sure to set your username in-game to match your discord username so we can find you easily if you win!

How to Join Game Night:

To join game night, click on the game night stage ‚Å†in the Fractal Discord server at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

events.title: Tetr.io Game Night
events.description: Community game nights are live events in the Fractal discord server. Come and play for a chance to take home part of the $200 prize pool! Free to enter, everyone is welcome!
events.rules:
Join the Fractal Discord server to play in Game Nights!

TETR.IO is a free-to-play online multiplayer and single-player modern yet familiar online stacker. Players can play against friends and foes all over the world and claim a spot on the leaderboard!  

Game Night Format:

We will be running a garbage-based mode of Tetris, with the player being able to send garbage to other players. The aim is to be the last surviving player. Each lobby can host as many players as we want! The winner of each lobby will receive a $5 prize!

Prize structure:

Place Prize $
1st: $10
2nd: $5
3rd: $4
4th: $3
5th: $3
6-10: $2
11-20: $1

Be sure to set your username in game to match your discord username so we can find you easily if you win, and be prepared to take a screenshot to prove you made it to the final round. Throughout the night we'll also be spinning the wheel-of-winning and giving away $5 to participants who have attended game night.

How to prepare for Game Night:

  • Link your discord account to your Fractal Account
  • Please make sure your tetr.io name is similar to your discord username!
  • Click on the game night stage at the right time to join the fun!

Tetr.io can be played in browser https://tetr.io/ To join game night, click on the game night stage in the Fractal discord server at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

events.title: Sparkball Fractal Open
events.description: Sparkball is a 4v4 MOBA that mixes elements from team based combat and goal scoring (think League of Legends x Rocket League). Play in Sparkball's early access weekend with your Steam account linked to your Fractal account to be eligible for exclusive Fractal gamer prizes!
events.rules:
üö®üö®üö® UPDATE üö®üö®üö®

We have received word that the Sparkball Discord server was compromised this morning. The game and website are unaffected but do NOT click on any links in the Sparkadia discord server offering a token airdrop. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates to the event as they unfold. Stay safe out there!

This tournament is open to all Sparkball players who link their steam accounts to their Fractal accounts. Once linked, your in-game results will automatically be sent to the Fractal Open leaderboard and the top 90 players will take home part of a $300 USDC prize pool!

No entry fees, everyone is welcome!

How to Play in the Event:

  1. Link your discord and steam account to your Fractal account here
  2. Download Sparkball from Steam
  3. Play ranked matches of Sparkball during the early access weekend
  4. If linked properly your scores will automatically be registered on the leaderboard

Scoring:

Leaderboard scores will be a combination of the following:
 

Win: 20 points

Goal: 5 points

Kill: 5 points

Assist: 3 points

Death: - 3 points

 

Prizepool:

Rank Prize $ F-points

1st place:

$50

40k

2nd place

$25

30k

3rd place

$15

20k

4th place

$11

10k

5th place

$9

8k

6-10

$6

5k

11-30

$3

2k

31-70

$2

2k

71-90

$1

1k for all players who have a positive score and play more than 5 games

 

Prizes will be sent to Fractal wallets within 7 days of the end of the event.

 

Fairplay

The following actions are prohibited and gamers caught doing any of the following actions will forfeit any and all prizes won during the event. Fractal and Fractal game partners reserve the right to disqualify tournament players in the event of cheating, which includes but is not limited to:
 

  • Tamper with the game to gain an advantage over other players
  • Use third-party software/macros to automate gameplay
  • Use third-party software to modify game data
  • Share your wallet or account
  • Tamper with your reported scores
  • Exploit a bug to gain an unfair advantage over other players
  • Play against another account that you have created and/or are associated with unfairly
  • Intentionally losing to another account could result in both accounts being considered cheating


Cheating will result in disqualification from the tournament and forfeiture of any leaderboard prizes. Fractal also reserves the right to terminate cheaters’ accounts and prevent their entry in future tournaments.

 

Help, feedback, and support

For any issues, inquiries, or feedback, please let us know in the Fractal Discord! All tournament prizes will be distributed within a week after the tournament finishes. Happy playing! ü´∂

events.title: EU Game Night: EV.IO Snipe the Streamer

events.rules:
Join the Fractal Discord Server to Play in Fractal Game Nights!

EU players have demanded game nights in their timezone and Fractal has now decided to assemble all EU game nighters for an hour of chaos in the EV io battlegrounds! Join us for some fun and nice prizes if you have the skills to take down Noppera!

Game Night Format:

We'll be playing rounds of Snipe the Streamer in EV.IO where the streamer will be Noppera. For every time you kill Noppera, you will get $5. 

Each round the streamer will have 5 lives so if you are really good, you can take home up to $25 per round. üí∞

We'll also be spinning the Wheel-of-Winning throughout the night and giving away $5 for each spin to random game nighters who showed up to play.

How to Prepare for Game Night :

- Link your Discord account to your Fractal account 

 Click on the game night stage at the right time to join the fun! This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

events.title: TF2 Game Night: VS Saxton Hale
events.description: Community game nights are live events in the Fractal discord server. Come and play for a chance to take home part of the $200 prize pool! Free to enter, everyone is welcome!

tournament.title: TF2 Game Night: Vs Saxton Hale

events.rules:
Join the Fractal Discord server to play in Game Nights!

Join us in our exclusive TF2 server and play together to win a big prize in the new game mode: Versus Saxton Hale.
Defeat bosses and take home part of the $200 prize pool!

Game Night Format: 

We will be running multiple lobbies of Versus Saxton Hale, when a round starts, a random player will be chosen to play as Saxton Hale on the BLU team, and the rest are assigned to the RED team with one goal: to kill Saxton Hale. The gameplay is similar to the Arena game mode: players have one life and cannot respawn once killed When game night starts, join one of the Fractal Community servers and start playing. If the server is full try another one until you get in. You'll be facing Saxton Hale as a team, and for every win, EVERYONE in your team will receive part of the $200 prize pool! If the player playing as Saxton Hale wins he will get all of the prize money üëÄ 

Be sure to set your username in game to match your discord username so we can find you easily if you win, and be prepared to take a screenshot to prove you made it to the final round.

How to prepare for Game Night: ‚úÖ

  • Link your discord and steam accounts to your Fractal wallet
  • Download TF2 from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/

Add Fractal's community servers to your favorites (list of servers will be available at the beginning of our Game Night) To join game night, click on the game night stage in the top left at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE! ‚è∞

events.title: Ev.io Season 4 "Kill Shot"
events.description: Battle For $2500 every month! Ev Season 4 is here, play the first person shooter game July 10-31. Land as many kill shots as you can. Earn F Points for making your first successful kill, play more to redeem raffle tickets from a $2500 prize pool!
events.rules:
EV.IO - an FPS ranked top 5 by Polkastarter Gaming - is running seasonal events on Fractal! Here‚Äôs what you need to know: 

  • Dates: Each season lasts 3 weeks and starts again the following month. Season 4 begins July 10th at 5pm UTC and ends July 31th at 5pm UTC
  • How to enter: Play the game and create a Fractal Account
  • How to rank: Land as many kill shots as you can! The more and better you play, the higher your leaderboard rank 
  • How to win: Earn F Points for making your first successful kill, play more to redeem raffle tickets from a $2500 prize pool!

Keep reading for insider tips and tricks, a breakdown of the prizes and rewards, and more! 

To get real-time updates and 24/7 support on all our tournaments, be sure to join Fractal Discord. 

How to enter the seasonal prize pool 

  1. Go to Ev on Fractal and tap ‚ÄúLaunch Game‚Äù
  2. Sign up or log in with your Ev account here
  3. Go to your profile page, click on ‚ÄúConnect Wallet‚Äù then select Fractal Wallet

You are now eligible to play in the Ev Season and qualify for the $2500 prize pool!

How the season works

Simply play in any game mode. You  earn raffle tickets based on the number of kills you make. Each player can hold a maximum of 3 raffle tickets.

  • 1 kill = 1 raffle ticket
  • 50 kills = 2 raffle tickets
  • 100 kills = 3 raffle tickets

When the event finishes, there will be 100 raffle draws of $25 / each. You can win multiple times if you hold multiple winner tickets! You will receive winnings directly in your Fractal account! 

Anti-cheating

Fractal and Fractal game partners reserve the right to disqualify tournament players in the event of cheating. It is considered cheating and is strictly prohibited to:

  • Tamper with the game to gain an advantage over other players
  • Use third-party software/macros to automate gameplay
  • Use third-party software to modify game data
  • Share your wallet or account
  • Tamper with your report score
  • Exploit a bug to gain an unfair advantage over other players

Cheating will result in disqualification from the tournament and forfeiture of any leaderboard prizes. Fractal also reserves the right to terminate cheaters‚Äô accounts and prevent their entry in future tournaments. Fractal reserves the right to update its anti-cheating policies.

Help, feedback and support

For any issues, inquiries or feedback, please let us know in the Fractal Discord!

events.title: CS:GO Streamer Showdown
events.description: Play alongside your favorite streamers in a giant multi-server C4 mode match in CS:GO!
events.rules:
GET READY FOR THE BIGGEST GAME NIGHT EVENT EVER:  The Streamer Showdown! 

Side with one of Brazil's top web3 gaming streamers and invite your friends to compete against the other team and make Fractal Game Night history!

Are you #teamlombra, the Brazilian otter, enemy of making profits
Or #teamminharte, chicken impersonator, and prettiest mustache alive?

Tell the world who you're playing for on twitter!

üí∞ Prizes: $200 for leaderboard scores
üí∞ Prizes: $100 split to the winning team
üí∞ Bonus: $100 for secret missions

üéÆ Streamer Showdown Format: üéÆ On Tuesday July 25, 2023, pick a team to represent by typing !team in the Fractal Discord Server, then on July 27, 2023, you'll be assigned to a 10v10 c4 standard mode server, where you'll represent the streamer that you chose! You'll be putting up points on the leaderboard as you get kills, assists, plant, and defuse bombs. The top scores at the end of the night will receive part of a $200 prize pool, and the winning team will wager an additional $100! There will also be 5 secret missions that any player can unlock throughout the night worth $20 each! We will give clues but it will be up to you to figure them out and win!

Cheating will not be tolerated, we are going to record every player's perspective, if you get caught cheating you'll be perma-banned and your whole team will be disqualified.

How to prepare for Game Night:

  • Link your discord and steam accounts to your Fractal here: https://www.fractal.is/account?t=Profile
  • Download CS:GO from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/730/CounterStrike_Global_Offensive/
  • Register your team pick by typing !team on July 25, 2023 in the Fractal discord server
  • Add Fractal's community servers to your favorites in CS:GO (list of servers will be available at the beginning of our Game Night)

When the event begins, load up CS:GO and click on the game night stage in the Fractal Discord server at the right time to join the fun!

events.title: Defend The Kingdom Season 1
events.description: Play in DTK‚Äôs open Seasons on Fractal in your own time. Play games to earn raffle tickets for lucky draws, or rank top 1000 in trophies to earn from the $3000 prize pot! You earn 1/2/3 tickets for playing 1/50/100 games. The raffle will have 300 draws with $5 each. Hop in and start playing now!
events.rules:
Defend The Kingdom ‚Äî our favorite tower defense game ‚Äî is launching Seasonal Prize Pools on Fractal! Here‚Äôs what you need to know:

  • Dates: Each season lasts 14 days and starts again the following month. Season 1 begins July 3 at 12pm UTC and ends July 17 at 12pm UTC
  • How to enter: Play the game and create a Fractal Account
  • How to rank: Earn trophies and raffle tickets for each PvP battles completed (co-op results don‚Äôt count towards your seasonal score)
  • How to win: Rank top 1000 to claim from a $1500 top player pot, or redeem your raffle tickets for lucky draws of $5 / each!

Keep reading for insider tips and tricks, a breakdown of the prizes and rewards, and more!

To get real-time updates and 24/7 support on all our tournaments, be sure to join Fractal Discord.

How to enter the seasonal prize pool

  1. Go to Defend The Kingdom on Fractal and tap ‚ÄúPlay Now‚Äù
  2. To play on mobile, download the app from the App Store or Google Play
  3. Create a Defend The Kingdom account with your email and password
  4. Go to the event page in the game and select Fractal Tournament
  5. Link your DTK account with your Fractal Account
  6. Click ‚ÄúBattle Now‚Äù to start queuing for matchmaking
  7. Complete matches, collect trophies and raffle tickets and climb the leaderboard!
Note: players can only bind one DTK account to each unique Fractal ID.

Tips and tricks for playing Defend The Kingdom

Defend the Kingdom is a mobile tower defense game developed by Kingdomverse. Gather your units and lead your Monkey Legend Heroes into battle against the Demon Empire. You‚Äôll need to build, strategize and outwit your opponents to restore peace to the Kingdom.

Be sure to study the in-game tutorial before attempting PvP mode. Here are some tips and tricks:

  • Your monkey heroes will shoot at incoming creatures
  • Don‚Äôt let them get through your defense!
  • Gain SP by killing invaders
  • Spend your SP on spawning additional heroes or powering up heroes on the battlefield
  • Merge heroes of the same kind and dot to spawn higher-dot ones!

Check out the game explainer we made for DTK to learn more. Or follow Kingdomverse on Twitter and Discord.

Tournament schedule

DTK Seasons recur monthly on Fractal, each lasting 14 days.

Season 1 starts July 3 at 12pm UTC and ends July 17 at 12pm UTC.

Note: Fractal and DTK reserve the discretion to update this schedule at any time.

Prizes and rewards

DTK x Fractal Season 1 has a prize pool of $3000 USD. The prize pool will be divided into two equal pots for top players and raffle draws.

Top players pot ($1500)

Top 50 players on the leaderboard will share from a $1500 prize pot. The distribution will be as follows:

  • 1st place: $70
  • 2nd place: $55
  • 3rd place: $45
  • 4th place: $30
  • 5th place: $25
  • 6‚Äì10th place: $10 / each
  • 11‚Äì25th place: $5 / each
  • 26‚Äì50th place: $4 / each
  • 51‚Äì100th place: $3 / each
  • 101‚Äì1000th place: $1 / each

Raffle pot ($1500)

Players also earn raffle tickets based on the number of PvP battles they complete. Each player can hold a maximum of 3 raffle tickets.

  • 1 game completed = 1 raffle ticket
  • 50 games completed = 2 raffle tickets
  • 100 games completed = 3 raffle tickets

When the tournament finishes, there will be 300 raffle draws of $5 / each. Lucky players will receive their winnings in their Fractal account!

Anti-cheating

Fractal and Fractal game partners reserve the right to disqualify tournament players in the event of cheating, which includes but is not limited to:
  • Tamper with the game to gain an advantage over other players
  • Use third-party software/macros to automate gameplay
  • Use third-party software to modify game data
  • Share your wallet or account
  • Tamper with your reported scores
  • Exploit a bug to gain an unfair advantage over other players
  • Play against another account that you have created and/or are associated with unfairly
  • Intentionally losing to another account could result in both accounts being considered cheating

Cheating will result in disqualification from the tournament and forfeiture of any leaderboard prizes. Fractal also reserves the right to terminate cheaters‚Äô accounts and prevent their entry in future tournaments.

Help, feedback and support

For any issues, inquiries or feedback, please let us know in the Fractal Discord! All tournament prizes will be distributed within a week after the tournament finishes. Happy playing! ü´∂
